text: læa doy nænxn rea di sng rx su lma nı thuk prachachati (doy baycha wa) phwk than cng khea rph phakdi xallxhˌ læa cng hlik hni hı hang cak phwk cewd dangnan nı hmu phwk khea mi phu thi xallxhˌ thrng chinæa thang hı læa nı hmu phwk khea mi phu thi kar hlng phid khukhwr kæ khea chanan phwk cea cng trawen pi nı phændin læw cng du wa banplay khxng phu ptiseth nan pen chen dı
